title: Ochita Kuroi Yuusha no Densetsu - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Drama   Fantasy   Shounen   Supernatural
tags: Aristocracy   Male Protagonist   Royalty   Sword And Magic
author: Kagami Takaya
description:
Sion Astal always wanted Roland to be a country where everyone could smile, and now, faced with Rahel Miller, a man planning on revolutionizing their country he has a chance to do something about it.

Follow Sion Astal and other key revolutionaries through the past and present in their quest to change things and make Roland a better place.

Prequel to Densetsu no Yuusha no Densetsu.>
